questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'extends' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To implement an interface
To inherit a class
To override a method
To create an abstract class

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'super' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To call a method of the same class
To call a method of the parent class
To access a variable of the same class
To access a variable of the parent class

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'this' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To call a method of the same class
To access a variable of the same class
To call a method of the parent class
To access a variable of the parent class

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'abstract' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To create a class that cannot be instantiated
To create a class that can be instantiated
To create an interface
To create a method

questions.question: What is the purpose of the 'interface' keyword in Java?

choices.choice: To create a class
To create an abstract class
To create an interface
To create a method
